Welcome to Lil Nouns DAO! This place works
exactly like the Prop and Auction Houses, like
The proposal voting happens over to the left,
and the Auction bidding happens to the right.
You can find all the information about Lils
over on that bulletin board over there, and
you can even check the treasury amount by
searching that purple treasure chest up top.
